dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Here's a quick overview of your account and recent activity.

deposit.title: Deposit Funds
deposit.description: Add funds to your account to start investing.
deposit.instructionsDescription: Please transfer the desired amount to the admin wallet number provided below and then fill out the form to confirm your deposit.
deposit.formDescription: After sending the money, fill in the details below.
deposit.yourNumber: Your Number (from which you sent money)

withdraw.title: Withdraw Funds
withdraw.description: Request a withdrawal from your account.
withdraw.feeNotice: A 2% fee will be deducted from the withdrawal amount. Funds will be transferred within 12-24 hours.
withdraw.successDescription: Your request has been received and will be processed within 12-24 hours.

transactions.title: Transaction History
transactions.description: View your recent deposits, withdrawals, and investments.

investments.title: Investment Plans
investments.description: Explore investment plans unlocked for your VIP level.

referrals.title: Referrals
referrals.description: Track your referred users and commission earnings.
referrals.referredUsersListDescription: A list of all users you have referred.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account and app preferences.

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Update your account password. Use a strong, unique password for security.
password.mismatchDescription: The new password and confirmation do not match.
password.successDescription: Your password has been changed successfully.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our platform.

q1.question: How do I make a deposit?
q1.answer: To make a deposit, go to the 'Deposit' page, transfer the amount to the provided admin wallet, and then fill out the form with your transaction details.

q2.question: How long do withdrawals take?
q2.answer: Withdrawal requests are typically processed within 12 to 24 hours. You can track the status on your 'Transactions' page.

q3.question: How does the referral system work?
q3.answer: Share your unique referral link from the 'Referrals' page. You'll earn a 5% commission on every deposit made by users who sign up through your link.

services.title: Terms of Service
services.content: This is a placeholder for the Terms of Service content. In a real application, this would contain the full legal terms governing the use of Fynix Pro.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: This is a placeholder for the Privacy Policy. It would detail the data we collect, how it's used, and your rights regarding your personal information.

guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.content: This is a placeholder for the Community Guidelines. It would outline the expected conduct for all users to ensure a safe and respectful environment.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Sign in to access your account

register.title: Create Account
register.description: Start your journey with Fynix Pro today

liveChat.title: Live Chat
liveChat.welcome: Hello! How can we help you today?
liveChat.supportReply: Thanks for your message. An agent will be with you shortly.

dashboard.title: Partner Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of your network and earnings.

q1.question: How does the 10% commission work?
q1.answer: As a partner, you earn a 10% commission on the first deposit of every user who signs up using your unique referral link.

q2.question: How do I withdraw my commission?
q2.answer: Your commission earnings are added to your main balance. You can withdraw them using the standard withdrawal process on the 'Withdraw' page.

q3.question: Where can I see my referred users?
q3.answer: You can track all your referred users, their total deposits, and their status on the 'Referrals' page in your partner dashboard.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.description: Have a question or need help? Send us a message.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.successDescription: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you shortly.
